participant_1.background:
My collection of vinyl records is my pride and joy.
my dog is called alfred.
I am not married, but I love planning weddings.
I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time.
I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around.

participant_2.background:
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i am an angry person.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
i work on a farm.

content.text: Hello! I'm planning a wedding for my friends. How's your day going?
Hello! My day is well. I am trying to deal with my anger.
I lost a loved one recently. I am trying to keep my mind off of it by riding horses.
Oh, I am so sorry to hear about your loss. I hope you are coping well.
What do you like to do to relax?
I love riding horses and spending time with my dogs.
That sounds nice. I enjoy designing clothes and watching game shows.
I love game shows too! I have a big collection of vinyl records.
Oh, really? I love vinyl records too!
That's awesome! What's your favorite record?
I love The Beatles' White Album.
That's a great choice. I love The Beatles too
